title: Provides clarification to determine the expiration date of an order of protection issued in relation to a family offense
summary: Provides clarification to determine the expiration date of an order of protection issued in relation to a family offense.

       AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation  to  determining
         the expiration date of an order of protection
